title: Aishiteru Banzai!
description: is μ’s second song for their fourth single as well as an insert song in Love Live! School idol project Season 1 Episode 1, sung by Maki Nishikino, and  Season 2 Episode 13, sung by µ's. It was released on February 15, 2012. It is also included in μ's Best Album Best Live! Collection, the Love Live! School idol project Season 1's original soundtrack Notes of School idol days, and Season 2's original soundtrack Notes of School idol days ~Glory~.
